occupation: Consultant and Global Lead, Impact Measurement and Management at Accion
headline: Data | Digital Transformation | Innovation for Inclusive Growth
summary: I focus on leveraging market-based solutions to advance inclusive economic growth and sustainable development in emerging markets. My professional experience in Africa, Asia, Latin America, and Eastern Europe spans the public, private, and nonprofit sectors. I received my masters in international business and development economics from The Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy.

experiences.title: Consultant and Global Lead, Impact Measurement and Management
Director, Data Strategy & Insights
experiences.description: • Lead and support cross-functional projects using design thinking concepts and agile development methodologies to elicit data requirements, design and launch innovative, data-driven products, deliver results, and provide strategic insights/advice to clients and partners
experiences.location: Washington, District of Columbia, United States

experiences.title: Senior Manager, Digital Strategy & Data Analytics, Global Advisory Solutions
experiences.description:
-Provides strategic and operational support to clients and is responsible for managing implementation of projects on the strategic use of data, digital product design and customer strategy
-Supports industry engagement activities, leading research and publication of reports that provide actionable insights for industry actors to drive digital transformation in financial inclusion

experiences.title: Manager, Global Advisory Solutions - Digital
experiences.description:
-Advisory services including strategic, operational and management support to strengthen Accion partners and maximize impact, leveraging DFS innovations to lower cost and increase quality of financial services at scale
-Thought leadership within Accion and the broader financial inclusion industry in core areas of focus (data analytics, enhanced customer engagement, digital payments and branchless banking, SME finance, etc.), encouraging creation and replication of demonstration models

experiences.title: Lead Specialist, Channels & Technology
experiences.description:
-Perform research and analysis to provide advisory services for financial institution and FinTech clients advancing financial inclusion
-Core focus areas include: DFS, directed remittances, mobile payment solutions, agent networks, digital field applications and data analytics

experiences.title: Member Advisory Board
experiences.description: Appointed to serve one year term on SoFi's volunteer Member Advisory Board, providing strategic recommendations on new products and services to enrich the Member experience

experiences.title: Summer Associate, Public Private Partnerships
experiences.description: Strategy and operations for The MasterCard Center for Inclusive Growth

experiences.title: Strategy Consultant, Government Services and Solutions
experiences.description: Contracted by MasterCard as part of a student team at The Fletcher School to design and conduct a field study on financial inclusion, applying human-centered design principles to identify pain points and help build an effective digital financial services ecosystem for small businesses and beneficiaries of the Oportunidades cash transfer program in Mexico. Resulted in strategic recommendations incorporated into the redesigned program, now called Prospera. The program was successfully rolled out and won the Best Government Benefits Delivery under the Prepaid category at the 2016 Pay Awards.

experiences.company: The Center for International Environment and Resource Policy
experiences.title: Communications Manager
experiences.description:
-Conducted first strategic diagnosis of online communications, resulting in digital content strategy
-Managed social media accounts, generating 46% increase in Twitter followers
-Provided event coverage with lecture summaries

experiences.company: Consortium on Gender, Security, and Human Rights
experiences.title: Graduate Research Fellow
experiences.description: Conducted research and gender analysis on topics relating to international political economy and the business case for gender equality

experiences.title: Acting Executive Director
experiences.description:
-Provided weekly financial oversight for $300,000 operating budget
-Directed programmatic and fundraising activities, including strategic planning for two annual fundraising events
-Oversaw entire process, from partner selection through implementation, for three new projects
-Planned and led M&E for regional water and sanitation program in Swaziland

experiences.title: Program Officer
experiences.description:
-Increased fundraising through Women Helping Women campaign by more than 50%
-Coordinated logistics for 3 major fundraising events with over 300 donors
-Oversaw team of consultants with responsibility for PR, marketing, website, social media, and events
-Improved donor relations through increased web outreach
-Instituted and operationalized program management and administrative policies, including improved reporting standards

experiences.title: USAID Small Project Assistance (SPA) Committee Member and Grant Writing Coach
experiences.description:
-Reviewed USAID SPA grants and awarded over $200,000 in project funds
-Helped more than 15 peers successfully navigate USAID funding requirements

experiences.title: TEFL Trainer
experiences.description:
-Developed curricula and taught English 20 hours a week to 200 students from 4th-11th grade
-Planned and directed two-day regional leadership camp; managed all camp logistics including budget/community contribution, transport, food, lodging, materials, supplies, advertising, lesson plans, schedule, monitoring/evaluation, local media coverage 
-Conducted training of trainers (ToT) seminars and skills-building workshops on topics including project design and management, journalism and civic activism, human trafficking, domestic violence and HIV/AIDS education and prevention
-Secured PEPFAR grant funding to increase organizational capacity of Ukrainian partner organization
-Coordinated/moderated regional meetings to exchange skills and information between volunteers

experiences.title: Gender and Development Council, Girls Leading Our World (GLOW) Program Director
experiences.description:

-Liaised with International Organization for Migration (IOM) and local partners to coordinate student-run anti-trafficking awareness campaign
-Spearheaded development of gender training manual distributed to all Peace Corps Ukraine volunteers

experiences.title: Peer Editor and Writing Tutor
experiences.description:

accomplishment_publications.name: Demystifying Digital Lending: How Digital Transformation Can Help Financial Service Providers Reach New Customers, Drive Engagement, and Promote Financial Inclusion
accomplishment_publications.description: Accion’s new paper explores the opportunities and challenges of digital lending for financial service providers at every level of digitization. In addition to discussing common concerns, we share insights into new trends shaping the industry, and distill emerging best practices into a framework that any financial institution can use to start to implement digital lending today.

accomplishment_publications.name: Unlocking the Promise of (Big) Data to Promote Financial Inclusion
accomplishment_publications.description: This guide breaks down the multiple components required for a financial service provider to strengthen its data capabilities, while referencing the growing number of specific use cases for data-driven innovation in fostering a financially inclusive world.

recommendations:
Christelle Carito

      
          
          



              
                
        
              
  

      
          Kathleen is an effective and thoughtful leader. She is strategic and organized with a track record of implementing global projects over the years we worked together. As a systems thinker, she has a great ability to assess the financial landscape in multiple markets for innovation. She is the ultimate professional with high integrity. She is responsible and has quick and excellent follow-through.

Christina Mathilde Sjaastad

      
          
          



              
                
        
              
  

      
          Kathleen is a detailed-oriented leader who gives timely feedback, displays accurate and insightful knowledge on relevant topics and is a pleasure to work with. I hope our paths cross again in the future. Best of luck.
